name: 2022 7th International Conference on Biomedical Signal and Image Processing
content: Publication and Indexing: ACM International Conference Proceedings (ISBN: 978-1-4503-9669-1): indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). Or Journal of Image and Graphics (JOIG, ISSN: 2301-3699), indexed by Scopus (Since 2021), Google Scholar, etc.
